controller

Class ControllerViewSelectReanalysisFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ControllerViewSelectReanalysisFiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener

    public class ControllerViewSelectReanalysisFiles
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    This class defines the controller for managing the events generated by the view SelectReanalysisFiles.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerViewSelectReanalysisFiles

        public ControllerViewSelectReanalysisFiles(InterfaceViewSelectReanalysisFiles view,
                                           javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel datamodel,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> alreadySelectedFiles,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> alreadySelectedVars,
                                           int numberOfGeopoints)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        view - View that this controller will manage.
        datamodel - Reanalysis data files's information.
        alreadySelectedFiles - Already selected reanalysis data files in tab: Matching (ManageBuoys view).
        alreadySelectedVars - Name of the var of each already selected reanalysis data file.
        numberOfGeopoints - Number of geopoints in selected reanalysis data files.
